A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I would go to say this film is as bad as Episode 1

Opening crawl will give you goosebumps (that's a given)
This film feels like a massive "Fuck You" to everyone who waited 2 years for answers posed by The Force Awakens. I'm not saying there's not answers\, there are\, they're just really underwhelming and shit. 
Rey's story arc is the only one with minor purpose\, while every other characters' is pointless.
